TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 支持页分析器生成控件及其包含的子控件。

span.span: Supports the page parser in building a control and the child controls it contains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，页面上的每个控件都与默认 类相关联。By default, every control on a page is associated with a default class. 在分析过程中，ASP.NET 页框架将生成与页面控件树对应的 对象的树。During parsing, the ASP.NET page framework builds a tree of objects corresponding to the tree of controls for the page. 然后，使用 树生成用于创建控件树的页代码。The tree is then used to generate page code to create the control tree. 除子控件外， 还定义了如何分析控件标记内的内容。In addition to child controls, the defines the behavior of how the content within control tags is parsed. 您可以通过定义您自己的自定义控件生成器类来重写此默认行为。You can override this default behavior by defining your own custom control builder class. 为此，可将 特性应用于控件生成器类，如下所示：This is done by applying a attribute to your control builder class as follows: `[ControlBuilderAttribute(typeof(ControlBuilderType))]` ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，该控件的属性和内容在生成表时定义。The following code example creates a control whose attributes and content are defined at the time the table is built. 下面是用于生成可执行文件的命令行。The following is the command line to use to build the executable. ```vb vbc /r:System.dll /r:System.Web.dll /r:System.Drawing.dll /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/Bin/vb_mycontrolbuilder.dll myControlBuilder.vb ``` ```csharp csc /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/Bin/cs_mycontrolbuilder.dll myControlBuilder.cs ``` [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2/CS/controlbuilder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2/VB/controlbuilder.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用上一个自定义控件。The following code example uses the previous custom control. 特别是，它会生成一个表，其属性和内容在运行时定义。In particular, it builds a table whose attributes and content are defined at run time. 请注意， [@ Register](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/66f34922-be41-4e36-9dc8-1774d85311d1)指令中显示的值反映了前面的命令行。Notice that the values shown in the [@ Register](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/66f34922-be41-4e36-9dc8-1774d85311d1) directive reflect the previous command line. [!code-aspx-csharp[SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2/CS/controlbuilder.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2/VB/controlbuilder.aspx#2)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建 类的新实例。Use this constructor to create a new instance the class. > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数通常由 ASP.NET 在分析页和创建控件层次结构时使用。This constructor is generally used by ASP.NET when parsing the page and creating the control hierarchy. 它不应在代码中使用。It is not intended for use in your code.

summary.span: 确定在控件的开始和结束标记之间的内容中是否允许存在空白。

span.span: Determines whether white space literals are permitted in the content between a control's opening and closing tags.

summary.span: 此方法由 ASP.NET 页面框架调用。

span.span: This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于确定控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的内容中是否允许存在空白。The method is used to determine whether white space literals are permitted in the content between the opening and closing tags of a control. 如果此方法返回 `false`，则在页分析器处理内容之前，空白文本将从内容中裁剪。When this method returns `false`, the white space literals are trimmed from the content before the content is processed by the page parser. 如果此方法返回 `true`，则不会删除空白字符。When this method returns `true`, the white space literals not removed. 此方法由 ASP.NET 页框架在分析期间调用，不应在代码中直接调用。This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework during parsing and is not intended to be called directly in you code. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ControlBuilderSamples_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_1/CS/ctrlbuilder_1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlBuilderSamples_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_1/VB/ctrlbuilder_1.vb#4)]

para.span: 可以在派生类中重写此方法，以指示自定义控件中是否允许存在空白。

span.span: You can override this method in your derived class to indicate whether white space literals are permitted in your custom control.

summary.span: 将指定的文本内容添加到控件。

span.span: Adds the specified literal content to a control.

summary.span: 此方法由 ASP.NET 页面框架调用。

span.span: This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写 方法，以控制如何处理控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的文本内容。Override the method to control how literal content between the control's opening and closing tags is processed. 文本内容可以是浏览器向服务器控件传递的任何文本。Literal content can be any text that is passed by the browser to the server control. 例如，在其开始和结束标记之间的任何 HTML 元素和文本都是文本内容。For example, any HTML elements and text, between their opening and closing tags, are literal content. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ControlBuilderSamples_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_1/CS/ctrlbuilder_1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ControlBuilderSamples_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_1/VB/ctrlbuilder_1.vb#3)]

span.span: The string literal is not well formed.

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，在设计器中分析和保持控件时使用该对象管理与设备筛选器相关的服务。

span.span: Gets an object that is used to manage device-filter related services when parsing and persisting controls in the designer.

value.span: 一个 对象，在设计器中分析和保持控件时使用该对象管理与设备筛选器相关的服务。

span.span: An object that is used to manage device filter related services when parsing and persisting controls in the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口是特定于控件如何在设计器中使用设备筛选器的接口。The interface is an interface that is specific to how a control uses device filters in a designer. 当在浏览器请求上下文之外的设计器中分析或保存控件时， 提供了一种方法来确定当前控件是否受命名筛选器影响，以及命名筛选器是否是特定设备筛选器层次结构的一部分。When controls are parsed or persisted in the designer outside the context of a browser request, the provides a way to determine whether the current control is affected by a named filter and whether a named filter is part of a specific device-filter hierarchy.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool HtmlDecodeLiterals() cil managed
Public Overridable Function HtmlDecodeLiterals () As Boolean
abstract member HtmlDecodeLiterals : unit -> bool override this.HtmlDecodeLiterals : unit -> bool

summary.span: 确定 HTML 控件的字符串是否必须是 HTML 解码的。

span.span: Determines whether the literal string of an HTML control must be HTML decoded.

summary.span: 此方法由 ASP.NET 页面框架调用。

span.span: This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework.

returns.span: 如果要解码 HTML 控件字符串，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the HTML control literal string is to be decoded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本字符串引用 HTML 控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的文本。A literal string refers to the text between the opening and closing tag of an HTML control. 当文本转换为浏览器将显示的字符串表示形式而不是解释为 HTML 时，HTML 编码。HTML encoding is when text is converted into a string representation that the browser will display rather than interpret as HTML. 某些浏览器可能会截断问号（？）、"与" 符号（&）、斜杠标记（/）和空格等字符，因此这些字符必须在 `a` 标记中或在查询字符串中出现时进行编码。Characters such as the question mark (?), ampersand (&), slash mark (/), and spaces might be truncated or corrupted by some browsers, so those characters must be encoded when they appear in `a` tags or in query strings. 在分析过程中，ASP.NET 页框架调用 方法，不应在代码中直接调用。The method is called by the ASP.NET page framework during parsing and is not intended to be called directly in you code. ## Examples 下面的示例重写 方法，以允许对应用此生成器的任何控件中的文本字符串进行 HTML 解码。The following example overrides the method to allow HTML decoding of literal strings in any control this builder is applied to. [!code-csharp[ControlBuilderSamples_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_2/cs/ctrlbuilder1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlBuilderSamples_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_2/VB/ctrlbuilder1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用调用 方法时的 属性。The following example uses the property when the method is called. 当控件附加了此生成器时， 方法将通过设计器确定是否正在设计时访问该控件。When a control has this builder attached to it, the method determines whether the control is being accessed at design-time through a designer. 返回 属性的值，然后调用 方法。The returns the value of the property, and then the method is called. 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则会引发 。If the property is set to `false`, an is thrown. 否则，将在 调用时返回控件的内部文本。Otherwise, the inner text of the control is returned on the call. remarks.format: ## Remarks 内部文本是控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的文本。The inner text is the text between the opening and closing tags of the control. 此方法由 ASP.NET 页框架在分析期间调用，不应在代码中直接调用。This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework during parsing and is not intended to be called directly in you code. ## Examples 下面的示例使用调用 方法时的 属性。The following example uses the property when the method is called. 当控件附加了此生成器时， 通过设计器确定是否正在设计时访问该控件。When a control has this builder attached to it, the determines whether the control is being accessed at design-time through a designer. 返回 属性的值，然后调用 方法。The returns the value of the property, and then the method is called. 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则会引发 。If the property is set to `false`, an is thrown. 否则，将在 调用时返回控件的内部文本。Otherwise, the inner text of the control is returned on the call. remarks.format: ## Examples 此示例将重写 方法，以检查 属性，以确定应用此生成器的控件类型。This example overrides the method to check the property to determine what type of control this builder is applied to. 如果是 `CustomTextBox`，则生成器会检查控件中是否包含 属性的值。If it is a `CustomTextBox`, the builder checks whether the value of the property is included in the control. 如果是这样，则会引发异常，如果不是，则调用 方法。If so, an exception is thrown, if not the method is called. [!code-csharp[ControlBuilderSamples_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_4/cs/controlbuilder_4.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlBuilderSamples_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_4/VB/controlbuilder_4.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void ProcessGeneratedCode (System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit codeCompileUnit, System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration baseType, System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration derivedType, System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod buildMethod, System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod dataBindingMethod);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessGeneratedCode(class System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit codeCompileUnit, class System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration baseType, class System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration derivedType, class System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod buildMethod, class System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod dataBindingMethod) cil managed

Public Overridable Sub ProcessGeneratedCode (codeCompileUnit As CodeCompileUnit, baseType As CodeTypeDeclaration, derivedType As CodeTypeDeclaration, buildMethod As CodeMemberMethod, dataBindingMethod As CodeMemberMethod)

public: virtual void ProcessGeneratedCode(System::CodeDom::CodeCompileUnit ^ codeCompileUnit, System::CodeDom::CodeTypeDeclaration ^ baseType, System::CodeDom::CodeTypeDeclaration ^ derivedType, System::CodeDom::CodeMemberMethod ^ buildMethod, System::CodeDom::CodeMemberMethod ^ dataBindingMethod);

abstract member ProcessGeneratedCode : System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit * System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration * System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration * System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod * System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod -> unit override this.ProcessGeneratedCode : System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit * System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration * System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration * System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod * System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod -> unit

param.name: codeCompileUnit
param.span: 所生成控件的 CodeDOM 关系图的根容器。

span.span: The root container of a CodeDOM graph of the control that is being built.

param.name: baseType
param.span: 包含所生成控件的页面或用户控件的基类型。

span.span: The base type of the page or user control that contains the control that is being built.

param.name: derivedType
param.span: 包含所生成控件的页面或用户控件的派生类型。

span.span: The derived type of the page or user control that contains the control that is being built.

param.name: buildMethod
param.span: 用于生成控件的代码。

span.span: The code that is used to build the control.

param.name: dataBindingMethod
param.span: 用于生成控件的数据绑定方法的代码。

span.span: The code that is used to build the data-binding method of the control.

summary.span: 启用自定义控件生成器以访问生成的代码文档对象模型 (CodeDom)，并在分析和生成控件的过程中插入和修改代码。

span.span: Enables custom control builders to access the generated Code Document Object Model (CodeDom) and insert and modify code during the process of parsing and building controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在单文件页模型中，`baseType` 和 `derivedType` 参数是相同的 类型，通常从 类派生。In the single-file page model, the `baseType` and `derivedType` parameters are the same type, which typically derives from the class. 在代码隐藏页面模型中，`baseType` 是表示部分代码隐藏类的 类型，通常从 类派生。In the code-behind page model, `baseType` is the type that represents the partial code-behind class, which is typically derived from the class. `derivedType` 参数是从包含标记的分部类派生的类。The `derivedType` parameter is the class that derives from the partial class that contains the markup. 有关 ASP.NET 网页模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k33801s3(v=vs.100))。For more information about ASP.NET Web page models, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k33801s3(v=vs.100)). 有关如何使用 CodeDOM 来表示和生成源代码的详细信息，请参阅[动态源代码生成和编译](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-source-code-generation-and-compilation)。For more information about how to use the CodeDOM to represent and generate source code, see [Dynamic Source Code Generation and Compilation](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-source-code-generation-and-compilation).

related.span: 动态源代码生成和编译

span.span: Dynamic Source Code Generation and Compilation

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象用于在设计时管理控件的主题和外观。

span.span: Gets an object that is used in design time to manage control themes and skins.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象用于在设计时管理控件的主题和外观。

span.span: An object that is used in design time to manage control themes and skins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口是一个或多个 对象的容器，它们反过来提供 对象，在设计器中创建控件时，这些对象可将主题和控件外观应用于控件。The interface is a container for one or more objects, which in turn supply the objects that apply themes and control skins to controls when they are created in a designer.
